content: How many gallons of water are used by an average American household each day if they use 100 gallons per person and there are 2.5 people on average in a household?

If an average American household has 2.5 people and each person uses 100 gallons of water per day, then the total water usage per household per day would be:

2.5 people/household * 100 gallons/person/day = 250 gallons/household/day

So, an average American household uses approximately 250 gallons of water each day.
